issue.title: [C++] SchemaFromJSON for testing deeply nested schemas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9422](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9422). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Discussion: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7704#discussion_r453149152

It might be handy to provide a helper for building schemas from an embedded JSON string, as we do with ArrowFromJSON.
